question_text: Which of the following best explains why SAS drives are often used in enterprise environments instead of SATA drives?
answer_options: They are hot-swappable and support faster sustained speeds
They use a simpler connector design
They offer better compatibility with consumer-grade systems
correct_answer: They are hot-swappable and support faster sustained speeds
explanation: SAS drives support enterprise-grade features like hot swapping, faster speeds, and high reliability.
